attributes.action: A cashpoint is needed in Cardiff retail park, Llanishen
attributes.additional_details: Cardiff business retail park consists of 10 shops including M&S, Homesence, Dw Sports, Starbucks, Laura Ashley, Boots, Mountain Warehouse, Pets at Home, Specsavers and Carephone Warehouse. There is not a cash point in the buisness park and I think there needs to be. Please help get this petition signed. Thank you
attributes.background: Cardiff retail park consists of 10 shops, there is not a cash point in the area and the closest one is Llanishen village. It would be very convinent for a cash point to be put in place in the buisness park.
